info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 11:24PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lake, north central Missoula and southeastern Sanders Counties through 1215 AM MDT... At 1123 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Ignatius, or 25 miles south of Polson, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ravalli, St. Ignatius, Arlee, Allentown, Kicking Horse and Fort Connah. This includes Highway 93 between mile markers 20 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
